channel.title: Comments on: A New Age for Trade & Supply Chain Finance

item.title: By: David Parker
item.dc:creator: David Parker
item.description: This is a useful post for finding broken links within the website, what about links pointing outwards that are broken? I can use a free web service but wondered if this was possible.
item.content:encoded: This is a useful post for finding broken links within the website, what about links pointing outwards that are broken? I can use a free web service but wondered if this was possible.

item.title: By: Harry Olson
item.dc:creator: Harry Olson
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://creativekhichdi.github.io/community_first/2020/02/24/a-new-age-for-trade-supply-chain-finance-2/#comment-59">David Parker</a>.
Great tool! I am using a redirect plugin to send all my 404’s to my home page but I think it’s slacking sometimes.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to David Parker.

Great tool! I am using a redirect plugin to send all my 404’s to my home page but I think it’s slacking sometimes.
